comment.shortText: The date/time components that a date column will display, using predefined options or a custom format string.
A timezone offset (such as '+0430'), or a standard UTC/GMT or continental US timezone abbreviation.

shortText: Decimal representation options, specified by a string in the following format:
`minIntegerDigits`: The minimum number of integer digits before the decimal point. Default is 1.
`minFractionDigits`: The minimum number of digits after the decimal point. Default is 0.
`maxFractionDigits`: The maximum number of digits after the decimal point. Default is 3.

comment.shortText: The currency code of type string, default value undefined

shortText: Allow us to display currency 'symbol' or 'code' or 'symbol-narrow' or our own string.
The value is of type string. By default is set to 'symbol'
